data.title: Tap in Rhythm and Perform Your Favourite Music
data.meta_description: Touch Pianist is a musical toy / instrument that allows the user to perform hard-to-play classical piano music favorites (from composers like Beethoven, Mozart, Bach, Satie, Debussy to name a few) just by tapping the rhythm of the piece's particular sound events on a computer keyboard or a touch screen.
data.text:
What is this? / Who made it? / Doesn't work well? / Press Kit

More pieces.

Touch expression.

Free on Android and iOS.
